bibl.title: Sakkara - Kopalnia źródeł do historii Egiptu. [Saqqara - a mine of sources for the history of Egypt.]
bibl.note: This research was performed by a joint Polish-Egyptian team. Directed by the author of the article, the excavations began in 1987 and have continued yearly since 1996. The article presents both the most important discoveries made by the mission and, in their light, the open questions inspiring further studies. - Avec résumé en anglais.
bibl.seg: Karol Myśliwiec, Sakkara - Kopalnia źródeł do historii Egiptu. [Saqqara - a mine of sources for the history of Egypt.]
Scripta Biblica et Orientalia 5 (2013) pp. 5-24, figg.

This research was performed by a joint Polish-Egyptian team. Directed by the author of the article, the excavations began in 1987 and have continued yearly since 1996. The article presents both the most important discoveries made by the mission and, in their light, the open questions inspiring further studies. - Avec résumé en anglais.
